Line 21: Line 21:
Ashampoo Burning Studio is a [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows. <br>
Ashampoo Burning Studio is a [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows. <br>
â
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras like [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]], and is not targeted at power-users. <br>
+
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, and very easy to use <ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml</ref>but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras like [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]], and is not targeted at power-users. <br>
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br>
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br>
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br>
It also allow the creation of DVD movies from video files. <br>
As a way to promote their software, Ashampoo gives away free copies of Ashampoo Burning Studio, but requires the user to give an email adress. [http://www.ashampoo.com/frontend/products/php/product.php?session_langid=2&idstring=0510]
